Подсолнечник - это растение, которое всегда повернуто к солнцу. Однако, благодаря нашей революционной технологии негенетической инженерии, нам удалось модифицировать его так, чтобы он всегда оставался таким же!

Этот компактный душ misty обеспечивает водой без всяких забот. Он обеспечивает необходимый уровень чистоты и подавляющее количество воды. Ее хватит как минимум на трех человек! Антикоррозийный каркас делает кабину устойчивой к старению. Туманный душ идеально подходит для любого вида существ, даже для единорогов!

Созданный на основе древних инженерных принципов, таких как гравитация и гидродинамика, туалет HBB стал основой современной гигиены и эффективности. Сточные воды отводятся быстро, а сифон останавливает почти все неприятные запахи до того, как они вернутся в помещение. Оригинально открывающееся сиденье унитаза и ручка смыва делают пользование туалетом проще, чем когда-либо прежде. Приобретите свой собственный HBB прямо сейчас!
Простая раковина для ванной комнаты с регулятором горячей и холодной воды, удобной мыльницей и широкой раковиной. Она предназначена для мытья рук, поэтому не используйте ее в качестве ванны..

Этот простой белый холодильник позволяет хранить продукты с коротким и длительным сроком годности, продлевая его на несколько часов, дней, недель, лет и так далее. Запатентованная газовая технология выделяет минимальное количество угарного газа. В комплект поставки входят полки, ящики, дверцы и маленький гном, который, если его не кормить, будет непослушным, что может привести к многочисленным осложнениям.

Устали от холодной еды и летнего убранства? Ничто так не согреет кухню, как белоснежная духовка! Захватывающая двухтопливная конструкция позволяет использовать это чудо как со взрывной силой природного газа, так и с инновационным электрическим током. Вы можете использовать его для разогрева заранее приготовленных блюд или готовить свои собственные!

Вы устали пачкать руки и мыть за собой тарелки? Теперь у вас есть решение! Купите новейшую посудомоечную машину NRE, чтобы избавить себя от лишних хлопот. Инновационная технология тройной сушки, изобретенная нашей креативной командой домохозяек, идеально подходит для повседневной жизни. Просто установите ее, положите кубик, и огонь! С этим устройством у вас начнутся совершенно новые отношения с мытьем посуды!

Ваша игра поставит игрока перед множеством морально неоднозначных решений, которые повлияют на судьбу персонажей и сюжета.
Ваша игра будет рассказывать не только истории, созданные вами, но и те, которые возникают в результате взаимодействия игрока с различными игровыми системами, которые не были запланированы вами.
В вашей игре будет много различных сюжетных ответвлений, которые приведут к разным вариантам выбора и концовкам.
Художественный стиль игры, направленный на максимально возможное отображение реальности.
Вы сможете визуализировать 2D-изображения в своих играх.
Простой искусственный интеллект, который позволит игрокам осуществлять базовое взаимодействие с NPC в ваших играх.
Позволяет моделировать основные физические взаимодействия между объектами в вашей игре.
Вы сможете визуализировать 3D-изображения в своих играх.
Базовые алгоритмы, позволяющие легче выводить игровую сцену на экран с конечным разрешением.
Продвинутый искусственный интеллект, который позволит игрокам более разнообразные взаимодействия и более непредсказуемое поведение NPC.
Основные шейдеры, определяющие, как свет и тени взаимодействуют с игровыми моделями.
Усовершенствованные шейдеры позволяют добиться более реалистичных эффектов света и теней на ваших моделях, таких как отражения или дифракция.
Позволяет моделировать сложные физические взаимодействия между несколькими объектами в игре без большого влияния на производительность.
Оптимизированная версия алгоритмов, позволяющих выводить игровую сцену на экран с конечным разрешением.
Обеспечивает реалистичное освещение, тени и отражения, моделируя физическое поведение света в реальном времени без большого влияния на производительность.
Ручной баланс занимает много времени и требует множества игровых тестов, чтобы найти идеальный баланс между игровыми механиками.
Основные системы, которые пытаются предотвратить мошенничество игроков в вашей игре.
Ручная тестировка, которое отнимает много времени и требует нестандартного мышления для поиска всех возможных ошибок.
Позволяет вашим игрокам играть друг с другом одновременно в одном игровом случае.
Мистический банхаммер, выкованный из адской стали и божественного провидения. Позволяет навсегда запретить кому-либо играть в вашу игру.
Скрытые, продвинутые механизмы, которые пытаются предотвратить жульничество игроков в вашей игре.
Простые механизмы, например, требуемое подключение к Интернету, которые пытаются предотвратить получение игры из нелегальных источников.
Позволяет находить больше ошибок раньше, собирая дополнительную информацию в журналах и отслеживая решенные проблемы.
Более продвинутые механизмы, которые пытаются помешать хакерам взломать вашу игру и распространить ее в Интернете.
Автоматизированное тестирование экономит много времени на тестирование вновь добавленных функций и игровой механики.
Система автоматического баланса позволяет протестировать все переменные в вашей игре, чтобы найти наиболее подходящие значения.
Базовая структура пользовательского интерфейса для ваших приложений.
Более совершенная и удобная структура интерфейса для ваших приложений.
Ваши приложения используют палитру сочетающихся цветов.

Темная тема приложения спасает глаза многих людей и делает их жизнь лучше!

Thank you so much for buying our game! We hope you'll have a lot of fun playing it! Here is a quick tutorial on how to play. Chapters: {0} Use arrows below to move between tutorial stages or close it by clicking "X". You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner. To return to this chapter click on DevLife Tutorial.

Welcome to DevLife! Here are some basic camera controls: - Hold RMB - Rotate Camera - Scroll - Zoom Camera - WSAD - Move Camera - Left Shift - Speed-up Camera You can also use arrows on your keyboard: - Arrow Up / Down - Zoom Camera - Arrow Left / Right - Rotate Camera Horizontally - Left Alt + Arrow Up / Down - Rotate Camera Vertically Press F6 to toggle cinematic camera: - E / Q - Move Camera Up / Down - Left Shift - Slow Down Camera - F7 - Take Screenshot
The very first step you should take is assigning you character to the workstation. Click on the Workstation Tracker and then select your employee.
Thanks to Workstation Trackers you can manage your employees, create new projects and learn new skills. Remember that employee must be assign to workstation to be able to create projects.

Although you've already selected three skills for your character you cannot use them to create projects. First you must learn how to use them. You have two options to do that: - Buy one of the courses available in the Workstation Tracker -> Learning - Create learning project in the Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Learning Then choose skill you want to learn. You need to learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project to proceed.

In DevLife you have many options to customize and upgrade your working space. To do that you need to enter the Build Mode by clicking on it's icon in the bottom panel. Location furnishings and its appearance directly affects the mood of your employees and the effectiveness of their work. It's worth making sure that your workspace looks as good as possible! To place a furniture just Drag and Drop it into the available space. Many furnitures have variants which you can choose by clicking RMB on the furniture button to pin the furniture information. If you want to sell furniture press X on your keyboard while dragging it. Use Q and E to rotate the furniture.

In order to create and publish your own projects you will need to create a company. In addition for them to be effective, you'll need to have a large fan base that is willing to buy your product. At the beginning, commissions for external clients will have to be enough for you. To unlock commissions searches you must learn at least one skill by buying a course and complete at least one learning project. First of all you need to search the market for appropriate commissions. Open the Commissions Search window, select commissions search criteria, start the search and then select employee to perform the search. Tip: At the beginning of the game it's advisable to select the "Only Unlocked" option. To be able to select more criteria you will need to upgrade your company. Also remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right commissions.

After you perform successful commissions search you will get a message with the results. You can also find them in the Commissions Manager.

Click on the found commission to see the details about it and decide whether or not it's worth taking.

You can also reject the offer if you are not intereseted. Remember that your clients won't wait forever and after some time their offers will expire.

It is good idea to select only one commision on the beginning of your adventure.

When you accept commission you need to create new project. To do that click Create Project Button in the Commission Panel or Workstation Tracker -> New Project -> Commercial. In the Project Creator window you need to select all components that are required in the commission. You can also add more components, create your own project (to do that deselect commission) or a learning one.

To start working on a component you need to click on it and assign one of your employees to start creating it. There are many variables that affect the speed of programming. The most important ones are: - Employee Stats - Employee Mood - Component Level - Component Advancement There is a chance of your employee thinking about solution to a problem in his component. This chance decreases with the component level. There is one more thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy

There is one very important thing that you need to be aware of - Employee Energy. Each action performed by employee requires energy. It regenerates with time, but if you overwork your employee he will need to go to a vacation. You can add Employee Energy by clicking Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy Option for sending employee for a vacation is in the same tab.

At any point during working on a project you can decide to end it. However, remember that if it's not finished it will have it's repercussions.

If your project is from a commission then you need to finish it before the deadline pass. If you don't make it in time you will get a penalty from commissioner.

Report after each project is available in the Messages window.

After your employee gains enough experience he will advanced to the next level. Each level gives you one skill point which you can use to unlock new skills or upgrade the old ones. To spend your skill points click on the corresponding notification or use Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Skills If you decide to upgrade your skill it will instantly advance on the next level. Remeber that newly bought skill won't be available in projects until you upgrade / learn them on at least 1 level. They also won't increase your employee stats.

The most important goal of the game is to create and manage your own company. To do that you must first finish at least one commission successfully and then meet the required conditions listed in the Create Company panel. Creating company is crucial to unlocking new options and progressing in the game. Thanks to it you will be able to hire more employees and unlock many bonuses that will improve your work. More on that in the Company Upgrades tutorial stage.

To help you with upgrading your company from time to time you will recive goals for your company. You can access the list of Company Goals by hovering over it's icon or by clicking on it to keep it visible all the time. You will get additional money and company Upgrade Points for fulfilling this goals.

In the finance panel you will find all information about your money. After creating your company you will be able to transfer money between your accounts and take bigger loans. To unlock better loans you will first have to unlock corresponding upgrades in the Company Upgrades. More on that in the next tutorial stage.

To access Company Upgrades you can click on the corresponding notification or open your Company Manager -> Company Upgrades. You can select from many upgrades from different categories. Almost every upgrade has it's levels which increase given bonus. To unlock / upgrade one of the upgrades you need to have Company Upgrade Points. You can earn them by finishing Company Goals or leveling your company.

Creating company allows you to hire more employees. The whole process of searching for employees is very similar to searching commissions. Choose search criteria, assign employee to perform the search and at the end see the message with the results. Every location has the maximum number of employees which you can have at the time. In first location you can hire only one additional employee. If you want to hire more, you'll have to buy new location. More on that in the next tutorial stage. If you decide that you don't need your employees anymore you can fire them in the Employees Manager. There you will also find more information about the employees you hire. Tip: Remember that some search criteria may be incompatible with each other and therefore prevent you from finding the right candidate.

In current version of the game there are two locations: Family House - your current location and City Center Office. You can travel between location by clicking on the floating arrow at the edge of each map. Every location has it's bonuses but also costs and bills. To see them you need to zoom out the camera to show Location Trackers. There you can find all information about the location and buy it. In the future there will be planty of new locations available for you to explore! That's the end of tutorial! You can come back here any time by clicking "?" in the top left corner.
Are you sure you want to cancel Interactive Tutorial?

Welcome to DevLife! Thank you so much for buying our game! We hope you'll have fun playing it! In order to make it easier for you to get started, we've prepared this short, Interactive Tutorial, in which you'll learn the basic of game mechanics. To start the Interactive Tutorial, click on the "Let's get going!" button. You know how to play? If so, you can skip the tutorial and go directly into the game. In case of any problems, you can use the text tutorial available after clicking on the "?" icon in the upper left corner of your screen.

Learning Even though your character already has three skills that you chose during the character creation, they cannot be used in projects. To change this, you must first learn them. There are three ways to do that in the game: - Buying courses - Creating learning projects - Upgrading with Skill Points In this tutorial we will show you the first two options. Follow the arrows visible on your screen to proceed.

Time Control Once you have started learning a skill, you need to wait a certain amount of time until your character has completed the selected course. To speed up this process, use the keys from 1 to 4, or click on the arrows at the top of the screen. To pause the game press Space or the Pause button, which is also located at the top of your screen.

Creating Projects The second way to learn new skills is creating learning projects. In addition to them, it is also possible to create projects from commissions, and in the future, after the establishment of your company, also completely own projects! Follow the arrows to open the Project Creator and proceed.
Creating Projects To assign a component to the project, click on it with LMB or drag it to the Selected Components panel. Create your first learning project to proceed.

Assigning Employees to Components Once the project is created, it will appear on the right side of the screen. To start working on its components, you need to assign employees to them. To do this, click on the selected component and then select an employee from the list. Follow the arrows visible on your screen to proceed.

Ending Work on Project At any time after creating a project, you can finish working on it by clicking on the "Release" button. Remember, however, that in the case of commissions and your own commercial projects, the completion rate of the project will affect its outcome. Complete the learning project to proceed.
First Commission You have gained some experience and you know how to create basic components. It's time to search for your first commission. Open the Commissions Search window to proceed.

Commissions Search In DevLife there are many search criteria for commissions. The most important one of them is "Only Unlocked", which will only provide you with commissions that you can complete at the given time. To proceed, start a new commission search with the "Only Unlocked" option checked.

Assigning Employee to Search Just like with working on components, you need to assign one of your employees to continue the search. Click on the commissions search and then select an employee from the list to proceed.

Employee Energy Note that every action your character performs takes the energy. After finishing this tutorial, you will be able to increase its amount in the Workstation Tracker -> Employee -> Add Energy Control the level of energy visible as a green bar above the workstation and let your employees rest from time to time. If the employee's energy is at a low value for a long time, they will become overworked. You can solve that problem by sending them on vacation. This option is also available in the Employee tab. Complete the current commissions search to proceed.

Interactive Tutorial Completed! You have completed your first commissions search and therefore this Interactive Tutorial. You already know the basics of playing DevLife and thanks to that your career in the IT industry can proceed! Your next goal is to accept and fulfill your first commission. You will find the search results in your messages or in the Commissions Manager window. In case of any problems, you can always use the text tutorial available by clicking on the "?" icon just above the messages button. Good luck!

You’ve tried to lean against the barrier and see what was inside the glass display cage. Unfortunately, you didn’t catch your balance and have fallen right onto the exhibit. The structure could not support your weight, and soon you were lying amidst shards of glass. Staff members quickly ran to you to check what happened. The disc that was held there didn’t make it. As it turned out, it was the original code of the game called “Spacewar!”. It is considered being the very first video game ever released. It was created back in 1962 by a programmer named Steve Russell. The game ran on the DEC PDP-1 computer and consisted of two spaceships. The goal of the game was to avoid colliding with the star while trying to shoot the other ship with missiles. You didn’t hurt yourself, but you will have to pay for some of the damage out of your own pocket. Fortunately, the museum has backups of this code and the first original disc is kept safe under lock and key.

Try to kill it on your own.

You grabbed a quite big book that was laying around and went to the kitchen to get rid of the scorpion. It was sitting right on the middle of the floor. With a swift motion, you managed to kill it right there on the spot! Just to make sure it's dead you hit it twice more and then flushed the body down the toilet drain.

You grabbed a quite big book that was laying around and went to the kitchen to get rid of the scorpion. It was sitting right on the middle of the floor. Unfortunately, you missed your first hit and the scorpion managed to sting you right in the hand! You quickly tried to hit it once more. This time you succeeded! But your hand is starting to hurt and it's getting red. You immediately call for an ambulance...

You called 911 and after about an hour a team of professional exterminators arrived at your office. They got to work right away and after few moments the scorpion was killed. You made a very wise decision calling for help because as it turns out it was a very poisonous and deadly species! Of course, their service will cost you some money.

The ambulance came as quickly as possible. Paramedics took you to the nearest hospital, where a dose of antitoxin was already being prepared. Your condition was getting worst and worst during the travel. You don't remember the moment of arriving at the hospital or getting the dose. You must have passed out. Fortunately, doctors managed to stabilize your condition but you will have to spend a few days on the ward to regenerate. You were lucky! The species of scorpion that stung you was one of the most dangerous in the world!

After some time spent in the hospital and regenerating you were finally sent home. The scorpion left you a memory of this situation in the form of a scar on your hand. Next time you shouldn't try to kill it by yourself and instead call for professionals!
I'll be more careful next time.

Your condition was getting worst and worst during the travel. You passed out. Unfortunately, doctors didn't manage to stabilize your condition and administer the dose on time. The toxin has wreaked too much havoc in your body. Farewell...

This morning you received a letter from your internet service provider. As it turns out they are terminating the contract with you! The notice period is only two weeks which means that you will not have access to the internet from the beginning of next month. The reason for the termination is the end of government subsidies that made it profitable for the company to maintain the entire infrastructure. What is worse, nobody wants to buy the network, which means that it will be completely dismantled! The only alternative is to buy mobile internet, and this means much higher costs, a less stable connection, and a monthly data cap. No small expense awaits you...
How the fuck is that even possible!

After more than a year of struggling with mobile internet, finally, a new internet service provider has appeared in your area, offering fiber optic internet at a reasonable price. You hope that this is the end of your misadventures with the internet and such situation will never happen again.

Your final exams at school are less than a year away. Maybe it's a good time to start preparing for them? You know, repeat material, do some tests from previous years. Of course, this will mean a lot less time for your work...
Maybe later. There's still a year left.
I don't care about the exams. There is work to be done.
The final exams are only three months away. If you don't start preparing now you may not have enough time to repeat everything later. Of course, this will mean a lot less time for your work...
Later. There is still some time left.
I don't care about the exams. There is work to be done.

This is your last chance to repeat anything before your final exams. You cannot put this away any longer. You need to make your decision right now. What is more important to you? School or the experience you'll gain from working instead of learning?
School, of course! I'll start preparing now.
Work, of course! I better get back to it.

The first day of your final exams has finally come! You dressed up in your most elegant clothes and went to the school for the very last time. You took a seat at the end of a big hall and when the clock hit 9 AM you started writing your answers...
After few days of writing final exams, you are finally done with school for the rest of your life! This chapter has come to its end. Now you only need to wait about a month for the results.

Your final exam results have finally come in! Thanks to your early and careful preparation, you were able to achieve very high scores! The time spent on it was well worth it! You are very proud of yourself.

Your final exam results have finally come in! Unfortunately, despite your early preparation, you got an average score. You came to the conclusion that the time spent on it was not worth it. You would be better off working instead of learning.
That was a waste of time...

Your final exam results have finally come in! Unfortunately, despite your early preparation, you got a bare minimum to pass it! You came to the conclusion that the time spent on it was not worth it. You would be better off working instead of learning.
That was a waste of time...

Your final exam results have finally come in! Despite the late start of your preparations, you were able to achieve quite good, average scores! The time spent on it was well worth it! Especially considering that you still go a lot of it to work on your projects. You are very proud of yourself.

Your final exam results have finally come in! You didn't prepare at all beforehand and it is reflected in your scores. You got a bare minimum to pass! But you glad that you didn't lose any time on revising. It wouldn't be worth it. You prefer to work rather than study.

One of your friends came over today to ask you for some money. They are in a hard financial situation because they lost their job recently. They promise to give all the money back in a few months as soon as they get back on their feet.
Come on! You don't owe me anything. Here you go!
Here you go. I hope it helps.

Your friend was very surprised but also grateful for your most generous offer. They rushed to hug you in a tight embrace in order to thank you. You assured them it's not that big of a deal and that you are always here for them if they need anything.

After a few months, your friend to whom you recently lent some money showed up at your place. Their financial situation has improved significantly and they are now able to pay you back the entire borrowed sum, with even a little bit extra.
Your friend was very disappointed in your decision. They are in desperate need of money. With a lowered head, they said goodbye to you and set off in further search of money from other friends...

One of your friends is starting a new business and they are looking for investors. This can be a great opportunity to multiply your wealth a bit. Of course, it is not said that the whole plan will work out and that your contribution will pay off at all. You are seriously considering whether to put money on the table at all and how much of it.

Over the past few months, your friend's newly opened business has been thriving. It has been very profitable, and your investment has paid off handsomely. Both you and your friend are proud of your achievement. Now it's time to collect your share of the profits!

For the past few months, your friend's newly opened business has not been doing well. The opening didn't produce the expected results, and things only got worse from there. Unfortunately, it was a bad investment and the business soon went bankrupt. There is no way to get back your money back...

The company of one of your influential and wealthy friends is about to debut on the stock market! He encourages everyone to buy as many shares as possible before they skyrocket to the top. You know, of course, that this carries a certain risk and the stock market is completely unpredictable. The question is do you want to make this investment?

Just as your friend announced, his company's stock actually skyrocketed after its debut on the stock market! Investors from all over the world are interested in buying your shares and it's finally time to sell them for a huge profit!

Unfortunately, your friend's company's stock didn't skyrocket after its debut on the stock market as expected. On the contrary! The price took a deep dive, and at some point, you decided there was no point in losing any more money. You got rid of your shares as quickly as possible, losing a lot of money in the process...

Uff, it worked! You paid a ransom to the hackers in exchange for their silence, so no data or source code of your applications was leaked. Now it's time to protect yourself more thoroughly! Install good anti-virus software, don't click on any suspicious attachments in your emails, and watch out for any phishing attempts on your data.

You were not intimidated. The time to respond to the message from hackers has passed, so the first leaks of the source codes of your applications appeared on a certain forum. Fans are not happy. Criminals are still in possession of sensitive company data, and their publication can mean very serious trouble and penalties from the commissioners. You have received another message with the last chance to pay the ransom before all your data is made public...
They won't get a penny from me!

Uff, it worked! You paid a ransom to the hackers in exchange for their silence, so the remaining data and source code of your applications did not leak out. Now it's time to protect yourself more thoroughly! Install good anti-virus software, don't click on any suspicious attachments in your emails, and watch out for any phishing attempts on your data.

You remained unbroken and didn't pay the ransom to the hackers. All of your data and the source codes of the applications you wrote - including those you did for your commissioners - have been published on the internet. This could mean serious safety issues for you, your employees, and the programs you wrote. The whole situation has made you extremely angry and you are preparing for penalties from your former contractors.

Due to the recent leak, you have received a call from one of your former contractors. They are demanding reimbursement for having to secure the software you created and compensation for their losses. The penalty in the letter is for a quite large sum...
I have no choice but to pay.

Fortunately, the leak incident has gone without too much notice, and no contractor has issued a demand for compensation. You are very relieved to hear that. Now it's time to protect yourself more thoroughly! Install good anti-virus software, don't click on any suspicious attachments in your emails, and watch out for any phishing attempts on your data.

You were knocked out of focus by a notification on your phone. A large sandstorm has formed in your area and authorities have issued a state-wide warning. Meteorologists are unable to predict the exact path of this storm and it is unclear whether it will hit the city.

Luckily, it turned out that the sandstorm had passed sideways of your town and did not cause any serious damage to the area. You breathed a sigh of relief, as its arrival could mean a power blackout and thus the impossibility of your work.

Unfortunately, it turned out that the sandstorm is going centrally on the city! Authorities advise to stay indoors and, in case you need to go outside, shield your face from inhaling sand and dust. All power will be cut off due to the high winds, which means you will not be able to work until the storm passes.
I hope it will end soon!

The sandstorm is finally over! Electricity has returned to the outlets, and as you learned later in the news, no one was hurt by the phenomenon, and the storm itself did not cause much damage to the area.
